title: No support in the US
text:
I started using this app recently and I‚Äôm quite frustrated with it. I filled out the application, I submitted my photo ID and selfie, I verified my email address, and I responded to their weird prompt. Since then, I have received no response, I have not been able to add money to my account, and there is no means of communication within the app to ask for help. There is no explanation of policy or anything. On top of that, the app will crash occasionally which makes me worried about glitchy performance and security. The US version, despite some good reviews from news services, does not seem to be up to par with the European version my family in Romania uses and enjoys. 

I would not recommend this app as it stands now.

title: Still can‚Äôt create my account

title: Great app but has the worst customer support
text:
The app works great and and super user friendly - I upgraded my subscription to platinum to have the full experience and no costs involved with my transactions. Although I have tried to contact the customer support to resolve an issue about a transaction and they have not got back to me for two days. 
Money issues are sensitive and customers need instant support when it comes to personal savings/funds. Unfortunately time costs money

title: Great for travelers in europe!
text: If you are going on a trip to europe, please get Revolut! Sometimes your travel credit card won't go through and Revolut always will. You can't transfer huge sums of money to your account at once but if you spread it over several weeks, you should have enough to spend on your trip! A great digital debit card with different currencies, and easy way to transfer money between people.

title: Not worth upgrading tiers
text: Premium and metal accounts used to be worth it. It had many benefits but they have been slowly taking them away and/or replacing them with benefits that you will never use. There is no longer free international transfers for premium/metal card users. They no longer give you unlimited stock trades, it is now limited to 10 free per month. They are slowly devaluing their premium tiers. A new service will eventually replace Revolut with better features and Revolut will eventually fail if they keep going down like this. The base service is good for small transfers between friends but be careful with large amounts.

title: Add money they lock your account
text:
I have several friends whose accounts have been locked for more than a month. I actually just signed up for the service less than a week ago, added some money because this is a really cool concept. Now my account is locked indefinitely for a ‚Äúsecurity check‚Äù. Offered to provide whatever they need and they said if they need anything they will contact me and they are very sorry but can‚Äôt provide a schedule on when it may be unlocked. 

I‚Äôm going to be charging back the funding if it isn‚Äôt unlocked by tomorrow. Thankfully they just have $20 of mine locked away. One of my friends can‚Äôt access 3 of their paychecks!

title: Horrible experience
text: I used this app to pay rent with no exchange fees in a foreign currency. After several months with no problems, my landlord told me my rent payment was missing. I look on the app and see that my payment is still pending, some three weeks later. I had no notification of this. I asked for help in the chat (there is no customer service phone number) and someone tells me that I need to provide information about my landlord‚Äôs company ownership, shareholders, website, address. I obviously don‚Äôt know this information! Several days later I got them to cancel the payment and refund me the money. What a nightmare! Never using this app again!!!

title: Radically worse
text: So I set up an account about 3 weeks ago. Made an international transaction and it never arrived on the other account. I had to get in touch with customer support via chat. I asked why didn‚Äôt get informed about a transaction that is on hold even though the money is withdrawn from my account. I was told that they do not inform the customer about this. Haha. Why would you? Would requiere a level of support. 2 weeks later still under review. Haven‚Äôt reimbursed my money and the support is useless. Chatting with different persons everyday, who are requesting different information. For this you charge a fee for the account? Must be a joke. To me it seems more like fraud. Going back to more established banks.

title: Deceiving atm fee free claims
text:
This bank claims there are no atm fee‚Äôs within the allowable amounts pertaining to your account level. This is false, I was charged and they claimed they didn‚Äôt charge the fee the atm did. With SoFi I get these reimbursed even when the atm charges me. They will not clarify this to get you to open the account. The cash back is embarrassing and it‚Äôs only for metal cards which are very overpriced for everything you don‚Äôt get. The only benefit is adding funds immediately from a debit card. Don‚Äôt do it.

Also don‚Äôt get the metal cards, the color comes off and looks cheap. If you downgrade they charge you for the metal card.

title: Huge Malpractice to a long term customer!
text:
I had been using Revolut for 4 years, I had subscribed to their Metal Card...
I had always praised Revolut services and advantages...
However a couple months after I got my Metal card, they launched a review on my account asking a few documents (Bank statements, Salary etc...).
I provided all the requested documents quickly. Then I got the message ¬´ We are currently reviewing your account and we will provide you with further details as soon as the review is finished. Meanwhile, you can contact us if you have any questions. Thank you for your understanding. ¬ª

This was 8 months ago...and nothing has changed...my review remains on ‚ÄòStandby‚Äô and I haven‚Äôt been able to access my account since then.
I still had some funds on it, and also the  Metal card subscription I paid annually would have only served me for 2 months...

This is a huge disappointment, shows a clear lack of loyalty recognition, and most importantly a great exemple of non-professionalism from Revolut.

title: Cannot verify identity...!

It keeps telling me ‚ÄúUps, cannot verify documents because they are not clear‚Äù. title: Account randomly shuts down same as many others
text:
Like many other one star reviews, Revolut is a great bank until suddenly and without warning they freeze your account and suspend it. No explanation.

Users will say it‚Äôs our fault, the users fault. I use the bank like any other user, maybe I travel more than usual and that caused a red flag? Whatever it is providing absolutely no explanation and freezing funds as if you are a criminal is not cool. Use the bank but don‚Äôt put your eggs in one basket they notoriously suspend accounts for any reason and since they have so many users they don‚Äôt care if they loose you as a customer or cause inconvenience. title: Revolut is both great and terribly bad
text:
When it comes to forex, international travel, payment wallet, dashboard analytics, etc., Revolut is revolutionary 
At the same Revolut is worse than traditional banks with local transfers. They are taking five working days to transfer my balance from one USD local account to other. 
If you request to expedite it, you get no help from their teams whatsoever
The automated system that makes revolut great also makes it worse, the irony!!

title: Unreliable transactions
text: I have been using Revolut to pay my tuition in the US by making transfer to my American account. Suddenly, without any warning my account got blocked and needed proof of income to continue making transactions. Customer service has been very poor and non responsive. I submitted a document for review and did not hear back. If a had an urgent payment due, this would cause me trouble. This shows simple te unreliability in payments and transfers.

title: ZERO SUPPORT, BEWARE!!
text:
IT‚ÄôS BEEN TWO WEEKS AND I CANNOT ACCESS MY MONEY THAT I KEEP ON MY REVOLUT ACCOUNT. 
After an update, the app started crashing every time I load it. I tried reinstalling (!) the iOS on my phone, tried logging in from a different phone. It crashes. I keep telling them the instructions they provided do not work, they keep copy pasting me the same instructions. It‚Äôs been two weeks and I have no way of accessing the money on my account.

title: Buggy App, Good Luck Getting Support
text: App can be buggy. About 3 weeks ago, out of the clear blue sky, it decided it wouldn‚Äôt accept my login. When I attempted to reset it, it went through all the motions as if the login had reset, only to discover that it wouldn‚Äôt let me login with the newly updated information either. This kept occurring on a loop. When I attempted to contact support, it took 3 hours of back and forth chatting for the issue to be corrected. Because I cannot risk running into this type of issues when traveling I decided to close the account; that was another 2 hours, and to this day I have yet to receive any confirmation that the account has in fact been closed. STAY AWAY!

title: Avoid and here‚Äôs why
text:
As a customer for 1 year, here‚Äôs why to avoid this so called bank. 

1. They are not a bank. They have applied for a Bank Charter and it HAS NOT been approved. They rely on an actual bank.

2. The chat will not provide any type of good service. Instead, they seem to just ‚Äúpass the buck‚Äù.

3. They are considered a ‚ÄúPrepaid Account‚Äù and the debit card they issue you is a ‚ÄúPrepaid Card‚Äù according to PayPal, CashApp and other banks.

4. You cannot transfer funds into your card. It will not work with PayPal, Venmo or CashApp.

5. They are Russian owned. Beware that they say they are based in the UK.

6. They will freeze your account with warning, for no reason at all.

7. They make money by providing products accounts. I would recommend not upgrading or giving them a dime for these unneeded services.

8. Limited amount of ATM withdrawals before they start charging you fees.

My review after a year, it‚Äôs a prepaid account, and prepaid style card. Worthless.

If you open an account, please get the free account.

title: DO NOT BANK WITH REVOLUT
text: Very very disappointed with Revolut's service!!! I am a current customer and basically my $$$$ dollars have been stuck since more than 12 days, I am literally unable to use my own money because they have an internal issue or bug that they claim is an ongoing issue and they are working on it, but every time I ask for an update the only response is "We are working on it and we will update you". title: Used to be great, stay away from Revolut
text: The customer service is absolutely the worst I‚Äôve ever experienced. I‚Äôve been with them since the start but I think they‚Äôve grown too quickly. title: Useless app
text: Useless service. Actually lack of service because Premium account is supposed to give you access to online chat, but there are no agents available. title: Irresponsible support team
text:

 Update: After the suggestion to contact via email of social media, no one was able to help me, they suggested me to contact via in app chat which is not helpful at all!

title: Highly disappointed with their support team
text: I have been going back and forth with this support team for months about how in the US I have zero access to any of the crypto portions of the app. They always get me tossed around like a rag doll from one rep to another within the help tab and pretend like they‚Äôre fixing the issue, but it‚Äôs lasted for literally months and has not been solved at all. title: Disappointing and not intuitive
text: I had very high expectations when I read about this app and the company. It has proven to be very disappointing and not at all intuitive. Maybe its only the case for US based users but its UX is very poor. Basic requirements like the ability to set up a recurring savings transfer from an external bank account not being included is a huge miss. Requiring customers to manually transfer all funds and only then set up recurring transfers within the app between accounts is a major UX fail. Whomever is leading product needs to go back to school and understand basic needs for an app which is targeted at savers!

title: Holding money without explanation
text: They‚Äôve been holding money added to the account for many weeks now without explanation and the only answer they give is that the matter has been escalated to the relevant team. We are talking weeks and months of holding. STAY AWAY!! Weird practices of verifying income, SSN, tax returns, w2, pictures, etc!! I wonder what are they doing with the data collected and why do they need it.

title: Steal your info
text:
Like other people mentioned Do Not add your personal debit info to this app. They will keep and sell your info. 
After signing up all my companies provided me with alerts on my credit and information. I only used one particular phone number for this company which is now overloaded with phishing and spam texts. Other banks also do not like doing business with them. There is no real customer support. They may help you sign up to get your info but them disappear once your cat fished. 
Spare your info, try other apps or if for traveling it will be cheaper in the long run to use your US based credit card. 
Dont Do It!

title: Money missing, useless customer service
text:
I have been a Revolut user for over 3 years and have recommended many to join. I have initiated a wire transfer to my account over 6 weeks ago and the money is yet to be reflected into my account. Customer service are useless, and there only response to constant queries is ‚Äúwe are still awaiting an update from the relevant team. They are experiencing a very high amount of requests and sadly there is a delay in their response‚Äù.

Clearly I am not the only customer with missing money. Revolut is by no means a credible substitute to traditional banks. I look forward to closing my account once I get my money back.

title: Poor Support and Misleading Functions
text:
Although I was urged to upgrade to paid version to enable crypto, it was not available to me. After hours of troubleshooting the app and my iPhone they determined the function was not available to US accounts.

Unable to add card to Apple Pay. After hours of troubleshooting the app on my iPhone and telling me to delete the apps cache (not available on my iPhone) they gave up and said they don‚Äôt handle cases of involving the backend communication between Revolut and Apple Pay.

They have good exchange rates but would be careful entrusting them with serious cash.

title: Thin shell of a bank
text: Used to live this bank when all I did was debit my other bank card and use the revolut card.  Until that other bank card expired on me while traveling.  Tried to deposit a check, still no funds after three weeks.  Same lame customer service promises.  Please be patient our team is working on it. text: Completely unnecessary service for travel in countries where businesses take a credit card. (Ironically, Revolut seems to be the only business in the world that doesn‚Äôt take credit cards.) title: Revolt 10
text: I‚Äôm gonna have to be honest here i‚Äôm not a fan of revolt 10 the original was way better I could find everything so easy but now with the update I feel like i can‚Äôt find anything, where‚Äôs the vault it‚Äôs just gone i can find it at all checked every page I would hope we can still choose to use the original design also i got someone signed up and it said i would get the 110 and I did it in time but it only gave me 85 for the referral ü•≤ I prefer the old revolt app design

title: Best traveler companion ever
text: Interface is among the best. Price for service is the best and service and capabilities are better than I could have imagined just 5 years ago. Cheap/free international transfers at the ACTUAL SPOT FX price!!!   (Holy crap it is literally as efficient as my online FX trading platform). Plus a debit card for your account if you are traveling someplace that needs something as last decade as actual paper money. If you ever use more than one currency. You need this service.

title: Account restricted for 2 months!
text:
For a small transfer of 1 eur that Revolut didn‚Äôt like, my account got restricted (no access to even see how much money I had left) for 8 weeks and then they decided to close my account, under a paid metal subscription. 

The in-app chat is useless, it is only a front-end department that takes no decisions and, all the time, over 3 times a week, they could only say we are reviewing your case, for TWO FULL MONTHS without being able to access my money!!! 

If you decide to download the app and face any issues skip talking to who the say in their own words is ‚Äúbest way to speak to them via the in-app chat‚Äù and save yourself sometime and ask them to give you the link to initiate a formal claim. All claims made in the in-app chat are not real claims as you are chatting to probably some 3rd party ‚Äúcall center‚Äù. 

The basis of a bank is secure access to your money, all works good until you face an issue and then you can loose access as it happened to me for two months.

title: The best fin-tech ever
text:
Revolut is great to work on multiple currencies, do transfers, get cash abroad and so on. Fees are either zero or low and you get many advantages.
The only drawback is that chat is the only communication channel, and you cannot get multiple consultations just one at the time. Not having a phone to call or email to send might make you feel little unease until you get used to it

text:

title: Absolute garbage
text: My info was leaked and with no live agents I had to take weeks to get it deleted and my info removed from the app. I have multiple online banking apps that never had a breach of security before. title: No customer service, phone number does nothing.
text: I don‚Äôt know how it‚Äôs possible that a financial institution has no customer service phone number.  When you do find a phone number, it‚Äôs all automated with no actual confirmation. title: Don‚Äôt expect your money to be returned!
text: I used this app to pay friends in Europe on a holiday back this summer and it was great for that. After my trip I have tried retrieving the money 6 times back to my bank.  Every attempt was denied or rejected.  I wasted an entire day chatting on the app (cause people don‚Äôt speak any more) to potentially find out my bank probably doesn‚Äôt accept transfers from Revolut. Be careful when using this app. If your bank doesn‚Äôt accept transfers then you are stuck with not getting your actual cash back and then are a prisoner to the app.  It‚Äôs a poor app and should not be in operation.
